Package model

Class SJF

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.SJF
  • public class SJF
extends java.lang.Object
    The SJF (Shortest Job First) class contains a processbag arraylist to store all processes needed. It also contains all methods necessary for process creation and simulation calculations for the SJF algorithm.
    Version:
    v1.0, 10/31/2019
    Author:
    Mike Spadaro mspadaro@student.sjcny.edu
    See Also:
    Java sourceCode

      class constructor, creates processBag based on number of processes needed from GUI.

      • runProcessesManual

        public void runProcessesManual​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> burstTimes)
        creates all processes from burst times from GUI, either random or user input. Sorts processes by job length. Calculates wait time and turnaround time. Runs average methods for wait and TA times.
        Parameters:
        ArrayList - burstTimes
